message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.GR 

The paper focuses on physics-based character animation and proposes a hierarchical reinforcement learning framework for completing an interactive task of sitting onto a chair. This involves training subtask controllers and a meta controller, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of deep reinforcement learning also suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper mentions the application of motion prediction given an image input, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR).
